Decay of trade. A treatise against the abating of interest. Or Reasons shewing the inconveniencies which will insue, by the bringing downe of interest money to six or five in the hundred, and raising the price of land in this kingdome. / By a Well wisher of the Common-wealth. Well wisher of the Common-wealth.
[2], 9, [1] p.
for John Sweeting, Printed at London : 1641.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
